Any additional charges and fees incurred: Any additional charges and fees incurred during your stay will be charged in your hotel’s local currency and may be subject to a foreign exchange fee.
Your booking is guaranteed and all paid: Your booking is guaranteed and all paid for.
You can easily cancel or change your boo: You can easily cancel or change your booking for free! Just follow the link from your confirmation email.
Free cancellation GMT with fee: If you change or cancel this booking after {time} {date}-{month}-{year} (GMT) you will be charged a cancellation fee of {percent}% the value of the stay.
We’re unable to refund any payment for n: We’re unable to refund any payment for no-shows or early check out.

These details are displayed next to your: These details are displayed next to your publicly shared reviews, ratings, photos etc. Any updates you make here will also appear in past contributions.
This information is only used to autofil: This information is only used to autofill your details and make it quicker for you to book. Your details will be stored securely and won’t be shared publicly.
